cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 6th Dec 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 6th Dec 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

privates.name: Deluxe 3 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Escape Cabins have a double and a single bed. They are air conditioned and have an ensuite bathroom, fridge, tea & coffee as well as a balcony with seating area.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or donâ€™t show up.

privates.name: Superior 6 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Endeavour Family Rooms have a queen bed, single and a double with single bunk. These rooms are newly refurbished and have an ensuite bathroom, fridge with tea and coffee and are air conditioned. The rooms have a covered outdoor seating and dining area. Sl

privates.name: Superior Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: St Crispin Cabins are standalone cabins set just 20 metres from the beach, hear the ocean from your room! Rooms have a King bed, ensuite bathroom, fridge, tea & coffee. All rooms are air conditioned and have a balcony with seating area.
